name: Vera Molnar Artwork Recreation
description: Recreation of one of Vera Molnars artworks. Keeping it similar to the original.

name: Molnar Variation 1
description: By deleting some vertex function calls and making other small changes - you get the look of doodly triangles. The deletion of the noLoop() gives it a sketchy touch!

name: Molnar Variation 2
description: Some changes to the original code transformeded it to something totallt different.
